Body.Content:
We are announcing the ability to migrate an environment from one tenant to another in Microsoft Dataverse. This feature will reach general availability on July 31, 2025.

How does this affect me?
With this feature, tenant admins can migrate their environments from a source tenant to a target tenant using PowerShell, streamlining the migration process and giving admins more control and flexibility. Using this feature allows admins to meet compliance requirements.

What action do I need to take?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

If you would like more information about this feature, please visit Tenant-to-tenant migrations.

Title: Microsoft Dataverse â€“ Tenant-to-tenant environment move
